verbs.description: [ARG0: Officials] [V: say] [ARG1: Trump is likely to go through with a Syria strike over his Defense Secretary ’s objections — because he said he would on Twitter] .
Officials say [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: likely to go through with a Syria strike over his Defense Secretary ’s objections] — [ARGM-CAU: because he said he would on Twitter] .
Officials say [ARG0: Trump] is likely to [V: go] [ARG2: through] [ARG1: with a Syria strike over his Defense Secretary ’s objections] — because he said he would on Twitter .
Officials say Trump is likely to go through with a Syria strike over his Defense Secretary ’s objections — because [ARG0: he] [V: said] [ARG1: he would on Twitter] .
Officials say Trump is likely to go through with a Syria strike over his Defense Secretary ’s objections — because he said [ARG1: he] [V: would] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] .
